{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Bitmain |model=AntRouter |revision=R3-LTC |fcc_date=04/16/2018 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=wireless router, crypto currency miner |fcc_id=2APAA-R3LTC |pwr_v=100-220 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=C7 |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA9531;QCA9531-BL3A; |cpu1_cspeed=560 |cpu2_brand=Bitmain |cpu2_model=BM1485 |cpu2_cores=6 |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q16 |fla2=128 |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5TU64M16HG-AC |ram2=256 |wi1_module= <!-- ITM F1031 --> |wi1_module_if=Mini PCIe (oversized) |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9531;QCA9531-BL3A; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |flags=fan, clock, Litecoin miner, |stock_os=Linux;;OpenWrt; |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ip=192.168.200.1 |default_user=root |default_pass=root }} {{TagLine|Router Miner}} :{{ProductPage|https://shop.bitmain.com/antrouter_r3_ltc.htm}}
FCC entry appears to cover additional models with different "main chips": * R3-DASH - BM1760 * R3-SIA - BM1720
